title: Simplify packages/sdk/ - remove bloat
acceptance_criteria: Remove unused exports and dead code from src/index.ts
Remove @neon/shared peer dependency if not needed
Simplify or remove complex abstractions (combineScorers, invertScorer, withThreshold if unused)
Keep core API: defineTest(), defineSuite(), run(), and essential scorers
Remove or simplify tracing module if not needed for local eval
Ensure package still builds: bun run build
Ensure tests pass: bun run test
Update exports in package.json to match simplified structure
